dataSource: WebSearch aggregation (Trendlyne, MoneyControl, Screener, StockAnalysis, BusinessUpturn)

Q2_FY2026.notes: Revenue grew 5.2% YoY from Rs 4,533 cr. Net profit up 16.5% from Rs 272 cr. EBITDA jumped 16.1% from Rs 380 cr. EBITDA margin expanded from 8.4%.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Revenue grew 14.3% YoY. Net profit increased 7.9%. Standalone EBITDA Rs 524 cr.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Very strong balance sheet with minimal debt (D/E 0.04). High ROCE of 23.7%. Conservative capital structure.

keyHighlights: Consistent revenue growth across product segments
EBITDA margin expansion in Q2 and Q3 FY2026
Strong demand in electrical consumer products
Minimal debt and strong balance sheet
